review: I have the Amazon Fire TV box that I use regularly, but wanted something for my other TV and something a little more portable and this worked great.  It seems to do everything the full size box does, except for the voice search, which is no big deal to me.  I had tried the Chromecast, but that was silly, you were actually just watching things through your phone, it didn't really do anything.  This is much better.  It's easy to use and streams nicely, I was afraid it would be choppy, but it never is.
